meanings.definition: It is necessary or proper for someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: It behoves us to study for the exam.
meanings.sent2: It behoves you to listen to your parents' advice.
meanings.sent3: It behoves the cat to catch the mouse before dinner.
meanings.sent4: It behoves a detective to solve the mystery before it's too late.
meanings.sent5: It behoves a gardener to water the plants regularly.

meanings.definition: It is appropriate or suitable for someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: It behoves her to wear a coat in the cold weather.
meanings.sent2: It behoves him to apologize for his mistake.
meanings.sent3: It behoves the clown to make people laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: It behoves a chef to use fresh ingredients in the dish.
meanings.sent5: It behoves a teacher to explain the lesson clearly to the students.
